title: The Uptake | Monday Musings
description: Everything you need to start your week right, plus a piping hot coffee.

title: Unlocking the Power of ESOPs: Seminar on Attracting Top Talent
description: Learn about the power of ESOPs in attracting top talent and achieving business goals at the seminar happening on April 26.

title: Osaka cafe blends real-world and virtual tourism for a hybrid experience
description: VR travel's future remains unclear as pandemic movement restrictions ease.

title: ByteDance Launches Fast-Fashion Clothing Store on Douyin App
description: ByteDance joins the fray in the fast-fashion industry with a new clothing retail platform available on its Douyin app.

title: Grab Launches New Travel-Focused Features for Post-Pandemic Tourism Industry
description: The ride-hailing giant introduces travel-focused features through partner integrations with WeChat, Alipay, and Kakao T to ensure a seamless booking and payment experience for travelers.

title: Europe, Japan can help ease rollout of EV battery rules: EU official
description: Cooperation is critical to lowering the regulatory burden on carmakers and suppliers.

title: Reality Redefined: How Virtual Reality Can Transform Tourism in Southeast Asia
description: VR isn’t likely to replace real-life traveling, but it could serve as a gateway to a more informed and connected world.

title: 5 Keys to Standing Out in the Superapp Crowd
description: The CX Edge 2022 Customer Experience in Singapore survey has revealed several key ways for companies to make their superapp shine.

title: Caulis Wins Nikkei Award at Japan’s Largest Fintech Summit FIN/SUM 2023
description: The pitch competition aimed to showcase the top 10 startups in Japan that are addressing social problems, including those in the fintech sector.

title: GreaterHeat’s Accelerator-Asia Debuts Decentralized Enterprise Storage on Filecoin at Hong Kong Web3 Festival 2023
description: The rise of decentralized cloud storage could help more Asian businesses thrive.
